meanings.definition: A rough or unfinished drawing or painting.
meanings.sent1: She quickly drew a sketch of the flower.
meanings.sent2: The artist spent hours perfecting the sketch of the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The sketch of the cat looked more like a potato with whiskers!
meanings.sent4: Her sketch of the sunset captured the colors beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The sketch of the old house brought back memories of childhood.

meanings.definition: A brief written or spoken account or description.
meanings.sent1: He wrote a sketch of his exciting adventure.
meanings.sent2: The journalist provided a detailed sketch of the event.
meanings.sent3: The sketch of the movie plot left out all the action scenes!
meanings.sent4: Her sketch of the novel's plot twist surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The sketch of the recipe made it easy to follow along.

meanings.definition: A short performance or piece of music.
meanings.sent1: The band played a lively sketch at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's sketch had the audience laughing non-stop.
meanings.sent3: The sketch of the song was so short, it ended before it began!
meanings.sent4: Her sketch on the piano was like a gentle breeze on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The sketch of the dance routine was graceful and elegant.
